text: Tekirdağ in Republic of Türkiye. Its population is 1,167,059.Its surface area is 6,313 km². Its border neighbors are Istanbul, Edirne, Kırklareli and Çanakkale. == Population of Tekirdağ by year == Year City Village Total 1927 34,993 96,453 131,446 1935 49,139 145,113 194,252 1940 51,994 157,894 209,888 1945 43,990 158,616 202,606 1950 45,694 179,127 224,821 1955 55,846 195,225 251,071 1960 84,896 189,910 274,806 1965 96,897 190,484 287,381 1970 117,351 185,595 302,946 1975 137,332 182,655 319,987 1980 167,270 193,472 360,742 1985 205,678 197,043 402,721 1990 258,940 209,902 468,842 2000 395,377 228,214 623,591 2007 494,342 234,054 728,396 2008 521,554 249,218 770,772 2009 530,278 253,032 783,310 2010 545,481 252,628 798,109 2011 572,359 257,514 829,873 2012 589,049 263,272 852,321 2013 874,475 874,475 2014 906,732 906,732 2015 937,910 937,910 2016 972,875 972,875 2017 1,005,463 1,005,463 2018 1,029,927 1,029,927 2019 1,055,412 1,055,412 2020 1,081,065 1,081,065 2021 1,113,400 1,113,400 2022 1,142,451 1,142,451 2023 1,167,059 1,167,059 == Mayors and governor == Mayors of District Çerkezköy Çorlu Ergene Kapaklı Hayrabolu Muratlı Malkara Şarköy Süleymanpaşa Marmaraereğlisi Saray Vahap AKAY Ahmet SARIKURT Müge Yıldız TOPAK Mustafa ÇETİN Tuncer BAŞOĞLU Varol TÜREL Nergiz Karaağaçlı ÖZTÜRK Alpay VAR Volkan Nallar Mustafa Onur BOZKURTER Abdül TAŞYASAN CHP CHP AK PARTİ AK PARTİ CHP CHP CHP CHP CHP CHP CHP == Transport == The distances from Tekirdağ city center (Süleymanpaşa) to other district centers are as follows. Süleymanpaşa: 1 km, Çorlu: 37 km, Ergene: 45 km, Çerkezköy: 62 km, Kapaklı: 68 km, Saray: 82 km, Muratlı: 25 km, Hayrabolu: 52 km, Malkara: 60 km, Marmaraereğlisi: 38 km, Şarköy: 84 km.
